item.name: Creacion del perfil Incorrecto 1 Sin Nombre
Creacion del perfil Incorrecto 2 Sin Biografia

body.raw:
{
  "type": "ImportProfile",
  "actor": "https://appsocial.com/sofia/",
  "name": "Perfil de Sofia",
  "object": {
      "id": "https://appsocial.com/Pepe/id1234",
      "type": "Person",
      "name": "Pepe Rodriguez",
      "username": "PepeR",
      "hasMultimedia": true,
      "public": true,
      "summary": "Amante de la naturaleza y entusiasta de la tecnología",
      "profileImage": "https://appsocial.com/sofia/profileImage.jpg",
    "endpoints": {
      "sharedInbox": "https://appsocial.com/inbox"
    },
    "importedFrom": "https://mastodon.ejemplo.com/@sofiR"
  },
  "to": "https://appsocial.com/system/import",
  "cc": ""
}

{
  "type": "ImportProfile",
  "actor": "https://appsocial.com/sofia/",
  "name": "Perfil de Sofia",
  "object": {
      "id": "https://appsocial.com/Pepe/id1234",
      "type": "Person",

      "username": "PepeR",
      "hasMultimedia": false,
      "public": true,
      "summary": "Amante de la naturaleza y entusiasta de la tecnología",
      "profileImage": "",
    "endpoints": {
      "sharedInbox": "https://appsocial.com/inbox"
    },
    "importedFrom": "https://mastodon.ejemplo.com/@sofiR"
  },
  "to": "https://appsocial.com/system/import",
  "cc": ""
}

item.name: Importación del perfil Incorrecto 1 Importar Perfil no Publico desde otro usuario

body.raw:
{
    "type": "ImportProfile",
    "actor": "https://appsocial.com/sofia/",
    "name": "Perfil de Sofia",
    "object": {
        "id": "https://appsocial.com/Pepe/id1234",
        "type": "Person",
        "name": "Pepe Rodriguez",
        "username": "PepeR",
        "hasMultimedia": true,
        "public": false,
        "summary": "Amante de la naturaleza y entusiasta de la tecnología.",
        "profileImage": "https://appsocial.com/sofia/profileImage.jpg",
        "endpoints": {
            "sharedInbox": "https://appsocial.com/inbox"
        },
        "importedFrom": "https://mastodon.ejemplo.com/@sofiR"
    },
    "to": ["https://appsocial.com/system/import"],
    "cc": []
}
